snippet.title: Police appealing to community to find two men after burglary
snippet.content:
DO YOU know these men?
Ipswich District Criminal Investigation Branch police are renewing their appeal in attempting to identify two men who may be able to assist with investigations.
The call-out comes following a break and enter at Flinders View on May 26.
If you have information for police, contact Policelink on 131 444 or provide information using the 24hrs per day. You can report information about crime anonymously to Crime Stoppers, a registered charity and community volunteer organisation, by calling 1800 333 000 or via 24hrs per day. Police are looking for this man.QPS
